Archive_Paragraph: Retain your organization's data for as long as it is needed, archiving old Transactions, Activities, and Transaction Lines based on the number of months back you wish to keep. Define a default setting for months to retain, and specific retention policies for each activity type.
Archive_Schedule_Paragraph: Set the day and time for data archiving. It is recommended to choose a time during low business activity with Pepperi.
Archive_Policy_Paragraph: Number of months for the default data retention period for all activities. Define retention per activity below.
Archive_TypesTable_NoItems: Click Add activity to define a data retention policy.
Archive_TypesModal_MinItemsTitle: Min records to retain per Account
Archive_TypesModal_MinItemsDisclaimer: if the number of records from the data retention months defined are less than this number, additional records from previous months will be retained
Archive_DeleteModal_Paragraph: Are you sure you want to delete this Activity from the data retention policy?
Archive_PublishModal_Success: Your data retention policy is saved and will be in effect on the next scheduled run.
Archive_ExecuteModal_Paragraph:
Are you sure? Keep in mind that it is not recommended to archive data during peak business hours.
If you confirm, any updated data retention settings will be applied and archiving will run.
Archive_ExecutingModal_Paragraph:
Data retention is running.

View execution log

It can take up to several minutes for the log to appear.
Archive_ReportModal_Paragraph:
Generating report...
This may take a few minutes. You may close this window and a link to the report will be added when ready.
Archive_ReportModal_NoItems: Something went wrong. Your report is empty.
Archive_InvalidFormModal_Paragraph: Please correct errors before performing this action
Archive_MissingActivityModal_Paragraph: Activity '{{Type}}' has been deleted from the system and will be removed
